title: EXPEDITION 100
overview:
This project was for a “NASA documentary” and we had been given a rough cut of their television advertisement. Our assignment was to create a text lockup as well as transition frames to go along with their story.

*created through School of Motion. For educational purposes only.
deliverables:
• 4-6 Design Boards based on the style we individually chose from our previous Mars exercise.
  • The boards must show footage treatment, full-screen title cards, show title + tune-in screen, and NASA TV logo.
descriptors:
• The full name of the show is Expedition 100: Mission to Mars
  • The tune-in information is: Premieres Sunday at 9pm
  • The demographic for the show is 25-65 skewed male
  • Want this to feel dangerous, awe-inspiring, cinematic.
metaDescription: Logan Rundquist's School of Motion Expedition 100 Project
